long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Windows admin recipes.

= ATTRIBUTES:

See metadata.rb

= USAGE:

Designed to be run within a RightScale ServerTemplate

Boot Scripts
  * change_admin_password - Changes the administrator password
  * enable_sql_express_service - Enables the SQL Express service if disabled
  * start_default_website -Starts the website named "Default Web Site" if it is not already running

name: win_admin

recipes.win_admin::start_default_website: Starts the website named "Default Web Site" if it is not already running
recipes.win_admin::enable_sql_express_service: Enables the SQL Express service if disabled
